Pick up the keg of Alchemist's Fire.
Pick up the keg of Alchemist's Fire.
"You mentioned something about a Boatman earlier."
"Maybe he's some type of ghost or spirit."
"Maybe he's a spy for the Valsharess."
"I want to know more about you."
"I get the feeling you don't like me."
"Do you have any information that might help against the Valsharess?"
Text: "발샤레스에 대항하는 데 도움이 될 정보가 있어?"

TextEng: "You said you could help me against the Valsharess."
Text: "발샤레스에 대항하는 데 도와줄 수 있다고 했잖아."

TextEng: "And how am I supposed to prove myself?"
"What if I don't want to prove myself to you?"
"We're all on the same side here."
"I know you. You're Grimgnaw, that dwarven monk from Neverwinter!"
Text: "알아요. 당신은 그림노, 네버윈터에서 온 드워프 수도사죠!"

TextEng: "Who are you? How do you know who I am?"
"I will swear allegiance to you, Grimgnaw."
"I think I would like to rule this Hell... You will swear allegiance to me!"
Text: "이 지옥을 내가 지배하고 싶군... 당신이 내게 충성을 맹세해!"

TextEng: "I don't care what you do here, I'm just looking for a way out."
Text: "당신이 여기서 뭘 하든 관심 없어요. 그냥 나갈 길을 찾고 있을 뿐이에요."
